name: Tutorial Guide
content: Welcome to Binary Coven! This is your first dialogue. The dialogue system supports multiple speakers with different sprites and longer text content.

name: System
content: You can advance the dialogue by clicking anywhere on the dialogue box or pressing any key. The system automatically handles progression through the sequence.

name: Tutorial Guide
content: Each dialogue entry can have a different speaker name, content, and sprite image. The sprite should be placed in the assets folder.

name: System
content: When you reach the last dialogue entry, the system will automatically close and return control to the game. Try it now!
